title: Moderate-speed city driving at night with clear skies.
caption: The ego vehicle drives down a city street at night, with moderate traffic and clear skies.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 1 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (clearNight). The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed (average speed â‰ˆ 7.8 m/s). There are 5 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The road is a two-lane city street with a center divider. There are several parked cars on the side of the road, and a few other cars driving in the opposite direction. The traffic lights are visible in the distance, and there is a pedestrian crossing the street. The weather is clear and the visibility is good.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed, following the traffic rules and maintaining a safe distance from other vehicles. It slows down when approaching intersections or pedestrian crossings. The driver is cautious and attentive, scanning the surroundings for any potential risks or obstacles. The clear night skies and well-lit street contribute to a safe driving environment.
